steve ⭐

i'm steve. i write everything in lowercase.

stuff i made

  • explorer format (format file (3.14MB) , source)

    custom story format for a future version of starchaser

  • genmo (v2) (source, demo (genmo-view))

    js framework for programatically navigating a Twine story

  • for the mania (source (glitch.com), demo)

    sonic mania title screen generator (cw: demo has flashing colors animating full-screen)

  • game library (source)

    list of owned games powered by the igdb api

  • react-vn (source, demo)

    react-based interactive fiction player/authoring tool

  • demandpad (source, demo)

    quick notetaking using localStorage

  • pabo (place, action, being, object) (source)

    not-smart story generator

  • aterriblefate (source)

    count down to the next year just like in clock town

writing/games

  • starchaser (source)

    unfinished twine game

  • world building vault site (site, source)

    site based on an obsidian vault running through notes on various story settings i've worked on
